fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 181.50 points or 0.94% to settle at 19,435.30. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, slumped 5.78% to 11.37. Reliance Industries, HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The September 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 28 September 2023.
